item.title: Deadly night shade on footpath 183 between 70 - 74 Marden Crescent, 12th September
item.description:
Deadly night shade is growing all along the footpath 183 between 70 -74 Marden Crescent. The berries are rolling down the hill where children kicking the wees and where the plants are so big. Even people just walking past are brushing on them and knocking the berries off. The berries look like black currents . These need to be cleared with a matter of urgency.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): FP183, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
